question: Are there any particular margins the client is looking for?
text: Not particularly. Perhaps we’d be in a better position to understand that once you know more about the sales and cost structure.

question: Who is the primary customer of the drug?
Can I have more information about our competitor drug Clearvenax?
text: At this stage, there is no relevant information to share other than already mentioned

question: Is our client global or primarily based out of the US?
text: The client is primarily based out of the US. Is that information relevant to the case? Think about it.

question: What are the kind of drugs our client manufactures?
text: There is no data available at this stage on that. I can tell you that the client does indeed manufacture other drugs

question: What is our variable production cost per dose?
text: We will get that in due course. I don’t think its relevant at this stage.
